articles.description: Follow live commentary, score & text updates as Everton host Chelsea, Luton play Man City, Fulham face West Ham and Tottenham play Newcastle in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League: Haaland ruled out of Man City game with Luton - radio & text

articles.description: Listen to BBC radio commentary of the European Champions Cup and Challenge Cup including Leicester Tigers v Stormers.
articles.title: Listen: Champions Cup & Challenge Cup - Leicester lead Stormers & Newcastle v Montpellier

articles.description: Manchester City need a second-half comeback at Kenilworth Road to end their four-match winless run in the Premier League.
articles.title: Man City come from behind to beat Luton

articles.description: Tottenham end their recent slump in emphatic style as they convincingly overpower a leg-weary Newcastle United.
articles.title: Richarlison scores twice as Spurs thump Newcastle

articles.description: England miss the chance to record a series clean sweep over India after falling to a five-wicket defeat in the third and final T20 in Mumbai.
articles.title: Subpar England beaten by India in final T20

articles.description: Granada's La Liga match with Athletic Bilbao is abandoned after a supporter dies in the stands at Nuevo Los Carmenes stadium.
articles.title: Granada match abandoned after fan dies in stands

articles.description: Abdoulaye Doucoure reached his century in style and is now leading Everton's charge up the table under the guidance of Sean Dyche.
articles.title: Hard-working Doucoure revels under Dyche

articles.description: The men's Big Bash League game between Melbourne Renegades and Perth Scorchers was abandoned because of an unsafe pitch.
articles.title: Big Bash game abandoned because of unsafe pitch

articles.description: Emma Hayes' Chelsea are "bullied" as Arsenal produce their performance of the season and mark themselves as title challengers.
articles.title: Chelsea 'bullied' as Arsenal show WSL title credentials

articles.description: Raul Jimenez continues his return to goalscoring form as Fulham thrash lacklustre West Ham at Craven Cottage.
articles.title: Jimenez scores again as Fulham hit West Ham for five
